colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES NGAN SONG SBYONG BA'I LHA MCHOG GAD MOS LA SBYAR CHOG PA'I GSHIN PO RJES 'DZIN GYI CHO GA GZHAN PHAN KUN KHYAB 'ONG SNANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, HAL HA GA-YAS RU SAR THUL SHOG GI DPIN GZHIS GRVA TSANG NAS DRI MED RNAM GNYIS KYI GSHIN PO SBYANG CHOG DGOS @014B TSUL BYUNG ZHING, CHOS GRVA 'DI KHA NAS KYANG NGAN SONG SBYONG BA'I LHA LNGA'I GSHIN PO SBYANG CHO GA DGOS TSUL LTAR, ^ SH'AKYA'I BTZUN GZUGS 'JAM DBYANGS DGYES PA'I BSHES GNYEN GYIS GCIG GYIS KUN 'THUS KYI TSUL DU RI KHROD BKA' GDAMS CHOS LDINGS SU BSGRIGS PA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN SLOB BU NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS BGYIS SO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN NYIN BYED CHES CHER 'BAR ZHING 'KHOR BA SDUG BSNGAL GYI RGYA MTSO 'DI NYID MYUR DU SKEM PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,AOm SVA STI, ,SKYABS MGON BZHI PA'I THUGS RJE'I 'OD STONG GIS, ,DUS MTHAR RGYAL BSTAN 'DAB BRGYA BZHAD PA'I TSAL, ,CHOS GRVA BKRA SHIS CHOS 'BYER GLING MCHOG NAS, ,SPAR GYI CHOS SBYIN SBRANG RTZI'I DGA' STON SPEL, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
